ai-thag6.3:1.3_0: They fall away from the true teaching,
ai-thag6.3:1.4_0: like a fish in plenty of water.
ai-thag6.3:2.3_0: doesn’t thrive in the true teaching,
ai-thag6.3:2.4_0: like a rotten seed in a field.
ai-thag6.3:3.4_0: in the teaching of the Dhamma king.
ai-thag6.3:4.3_0: doesn’t fall away from the true teaching,
ai-thag6.3:4.4_0: like a fish in plenty of water.
ai-thag6.3:5.3_0: they thrive in the true teaching,
ai-thag6.3:5.4_0: like a fine seed in a field.
ai-thag6.3:6.4_0: in the teaching of the Dhamma king.
